Raúl Felix Carrizo

Software Engineer

As a Software Engineer I specialise in Front end architecture and development. My primary focus is on web and mobile application development, responsive design and rapid prototyping. I enjoy technical challenges and interesting work.

I write a lot of native HTML, CSS and Javascript and have plenty experience with frameworks like ReactJS and Angular. I also build native and hybrid mobile apps.

Currently...

I work at the Commonwealth Bank of Australia making use of ReactJS and the latest in Javascript to build complex and engaging web applications.

I also like to collaborate on sites and recently built lifewithoutandy.com - a customised Wordpress site with a global fan base.

To contact me please email raulfelixcarrizo@gmail.com

A bit about me...

Football is my first love.

I speak Spanish and Italian.

I tend to listen more than I speak.

I’m not adventurous with food.

I love a good Peroni.

I wish Australia had a space program.

My professional history used to sit here but I think knowing who you are working with is more important… besides there is linkedIn.

Me as an engineer

I find learning and discovery through interesting challenges is the most satisfying aspect of my work.
